Package com.midiwars.util

Holds utility classes.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MyExceptions
    Holds multiple custom exceptions used throughout this application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Pair<F,S>
    'C++ Pair'
    WinRobot
    Synthesizes keyboard input events through the Windows Api.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MyExceptions.InvalidInstrumentException
    Thrown when the default instrument listed in the configurations file is invalid.
    MyExceptions.MidifilesNotFoundException
    Thrown when the midi files listed in the given playlist don't exist.
    MyExceptions.MidiPathNotFoundException
    Thrown when the default midi path listed in the configurations file doesn't exist.
    MyExceptions.UIAlreadyExists
    Thrown when trying to create a new UserInterface object and another UserInterface already exists.
